replies.author: BlackCB.
replies.txt_content:
effect @p speed 5 0 

在mc给予效果指令中0是1,1是2

replies.author: Belanga
replies.txt_content:
/effect @p speed 5 0复制代码

命令中真正等级=你输入的等级+1
